column4: anyone able to help me get sound working I installed 10.10 server and now need sound?
install alsa
did that, still no sound I have a m4a785td-v evo motherboard
once you've got that, ask again on how to configure it
ok how do I configure it?
type, alsamixer, then max outputs out
ok so I can't max out headphones
are any them showing MM at the base of the bars?
yes
center and surround
go to them press m to unmute them
how do I go to them, sorry it's not very user friendly
arrow keys
ok they are all un-muted how do I test, I have speakers setup
which one is the green connector in the back for normal analog speakers?
on mine it is, to test you need some kind of file to play
aplay /usr/share/sounds/alsa/Front_Center.wav
the card is hda ati sb, and the chip is via vt1708s is this supported for sure?
do this 'aplay /usr/share/sounds/alsa/Front_Center.wav' in a terminal if it plays sound then yes your card works :)
works, thanks a mil
you're welcome :)
